name: Shoot D'Damn Spiders
description:
Shoot D'Damn Spiders is my first FPS ever made.

In this Horror "Game" (just 2 levels, with no checkpoints, my bad) you will be locked in a laboratory. Mutant spiders want to kill you, and there are a lot, be careful. Kill most you can while running to make angry their mom. Ones the Mama gets into the lab, do your best to kill her. If you do it, all spiders will been destroyed and you win the game.

I clearly hate spiders...

Recomendations:

1. Play the game in a dark place.

2. Use your best headphones.

3. If you had already won the game, try the cheats console to kill more spiders.

4. Enjoy killing the Damn Spiders!
